page.title: 13MR.RYAN'S GARAGE
page.content: Ryan's Garage is situated in Mundell Street in South Moor.Mr.Ryan's hours of opening are from 8a.m. to 6.30p.m. six days a week.He is closed all day Sunday.The garage does not sell petrol but instead repairs and services all types of motor vehicles.He works alone and on average does about 10 cars each week.He runs a breakdown service to tow in vehicles which have broken down or crashed.Mr.Ryan does Ministry of Transport (M.O.T.) tests on vehicles over 3 years old.He works on both British and foreign cars and considers that British cars are better to work on because parts are cheaper and easier to get hold of.
